inclusion.criterion: Be between 18 and 80 years of age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject has chronic functional constipation according to the Rome III Diagnostic Criteria, where (f) is mandatory.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Straining during at least 25% of defæcations
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Lumpy or hard stools in at least 25% of defæcations
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Sensation of incomplete evacuation for at least 25% of defæcations
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subjects will continue on his/her normal diet
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: The subject agrees to complete the Patient Diary for two weeks prior to study entry and for the duration of the study.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Are less than 18 and greater than 80 years of age
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Females are pregnant, lactating or wish to become pregnant during the study.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subject has an obstructive or metabolic aetiology for constipation
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has V. cholerae in stool, which may indicate a contraindication to study participation.
